column2: Complete the sentences. Put the words in the right order.
column3:
{I eat more these days.} {More than before.}
I {{c1::didn't}} {{c1::use}} {{c1::to}} {{c1::eat}} {{c1::so much}} (so much / eat / didn't / to / use).

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the words in the right order.
column3:
{These days I go out a lot more than} {before.}
I {{c1::didn't}} {{c1::use}} {{c1::to}} {{c1::go out}} {{c1::so much}} (use / so much / to / didn't / go out).

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the words in the right order.
column3:
{I drink a lot of tea these days.}
I {{c1::didn't}} {{c1::use}} {{c1::to}} {{c1::drink}} {{c1::so much tea}} (drink / use / so much tea / to / didn't).

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the words in the right order.
column3: In your last job, how many hours a day {{c1::did}} {{c1::you}} {{c1::use}} {{c1::to}} {{c1::work}} (work / you / to / use / did)?

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the words in the right order.
column3: When you were a child, what games {{c1::did}} {{c1::you}} {{c1::use}} {{c1::to}} {{c1::play}} (use / you / play / did / to)?

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the words in the right order.
column3: When you lived in New York, {{c1::did}} {{c1::you}} {{c1::use}} {{c1::to}} {{c1::go}} (you / to / did / go / use) to the theatre a lot?
